argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rspcl.k | |- K = ( RSpan ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rspcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | rspcl.u | |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rlmlmod | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ringLMod ` R ) e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rlmbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_eqtri | |- B = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_lidlval | |- ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- U = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rspval | |- ( RSpan ` R ) = ( LSpan ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqtri | |- K = ( LSpan ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 8, 10 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( ( ringLMod ` R ) e. LMod /\ G C_ B ) -> ( K ` G ) e. U ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ G C_ B ) -> ( K ` G ) e. U ) |
